client.toolinfopane.controller

Class RefreshButtonListenerForToolInfoPane

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.toolinfopane.controller.RefreshButtonListenerForToolInfoPane
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class RefreshButtonListenerForToolInfoPane
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    A listener that waits for the refresh button to the tool info pane GUI to be pressed and then updates the toolInfoPaneGUI with new info from server
    Since:
    April 9th 2019
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sean Kenny and Jean-David Rousseau

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RefreshButtonListenerForToolInfoPane(Client clientToAsk, ToolInfoPaneGUI parent)
      Creates a listener that knows what client to ask for information and which ToolInfoPaneGUI to put the updated information in

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
      gives the tool info of the ToolInfoPaneGUI a more recent value

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • RefreshButtonListenerForToolInfoPane

        public RefreshButtonListenerForToolInfoPane(Client clientToAsk,
                                            ToolInfoPaneGUI parent)
        Creates a listener that knows what client to ask for information and which ToolInfoPaneGUI to put the updated information in
        Parameters:
        clientToAsk - the client that should be asked for info
        parent - the ToolInfoPane that will be updated as a result of the refresh button being pressed
